title: Trump announces 10% increase in tariffs on goods from Canada
shortDescription: Trump announced the increased tariffs on Oct. 25, referencing an anti-tariff ad aired by Ontario's government featuring a video of Ronald Reagan.

title: What to know about Trump's upcoming visit to South Korea
shortDescription: As the U.S. government shutdown enters its 25th day, President Donald Trump is embarking on a trip to Asia, where he will meet Xi Jinping.

title: Trump says Gaza stabilization force coming soon
shortDescription: “This should be an enduring peace,” President Trump told reporters when asked about the situation in Gaza after a refueling stop Saturday in Qatar.

title: What to know about Trump's visit to Japan next week
shortDescription: One of Trump’s stops during his Asia visit is Japan. Here is what you need to know about his visit to the country.

title: What to know about Trump's trip to Asia
shortDescription: President Donald Trump left for Asia late on Oct. 24, as the U.S. government shutdown continues and with the president seeking to resolve a trade war.

title: Trump ‘friend’ donates $130 million for military
shortDescription: The Pentagon said it has accepted an anonymous $130 million donation from an ally of President Trump that it plans to use to pay military members.

title: Trump heads to Asia looking for trade deal
shortDescription: President Trump is flying to Asia for a six-day trip where he is expected to meet with China for trade deal negotiations.

title: Trump 2028? 'There is a plan' despite Constitution, Bannon says
shortDescription: Steve Bannon, a former White House aide, suggested "there is a plan" for the president to defy the Constitution and seek a third term.

title: Trump says he 'hasn't really thought' about White House ballroom name
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he "doesn't have any plan" to name the $300 million White House ballroom after himself.

title: Schumer rips Trump over Asia trip as shutdown reaches 25 days: Updates
shortDescription: The federal government shutdown entered Day 25 on Saturday with no end in sight as President Donald Trump left for a six-day trip to Asia.

title: What Trump's federal crackdown looks like in 5 US cities
shortDescription: Troops have been deployed in LA, Chicago, DC, Memphis and Portland, Oregon. Each city has been changed in different ways.

title: Trump looms in Virginia, New Jersey, NYC and California 2025 races
shortDescription: President Trump isn't on the ballot in 2025. But he's still on voters' minds ahead of the first general election since his second term win a year ago.

title: Democrats' greatest Gen Z Hope? Meet Tim Walz's daughter.
shortDescription: Kamala Harris' 2024 running mate Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz had a sidekick of his own: His daughter Hope Walz. A year later, she's a social media star.

title: Trump ruffles feathers with a wrecking ball
shortDescription: The White House's East Wing isn't Donald Trump's first tear-down. He's been raising dust and outrage since the 1980s.

title: Meet Hope Walz, an emerging voice for young Democrats
shortDescription: Meet Hope Walz, Tim Walz's TikTok famous daughter who's emerged as a messenger for the Democratic party.

title: DOJ to monitor elections in California and NJ. State leaders blast move
shortDescription: The department will monitor elections at five sites in California and one in New Jersey ahead of elections in both states on Nov. 4, the agency announced Friday.

title: Trump to use $130M anonymous donation to pay military during shutdown
shortDescription: The Trump administration has accepted an anonymous $130 million donation that it plans to use to pay military members during the government shutdown.

title: Trump looking for trade deal on Asia trip
shortDescription: Donald Trump leaves for Asia late Oct. 24 eager to resolve a trade war over tariffs.

title: Canadian ad that miffed Trump will run during two World Series games
shortDescription: Ontario, Canada will keep airing an ad critical of tariffs through the weekend ‒ and then pause it ‒ following President Trump's objections.

title: Ghost stories surrounding the White House
shortDescription: Spiritual abnormalities have roamed the White House nearly as long as it has existed, according to the White House Historical Association.

title: Trump Jr. snipes at Chelsea Clinton's East Wing demolition comments
shortDescription: President Trump's eldest son takes to X to blast Chelsea Clinton's criticism of the White House's East Wing demolition for a $300 million ballroom.

title: Trump deploys USS Gerald Ford to South America
shortDescription: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth deployed a U.S. nuclear-powered aircraft carrier and guided missile destroyers to the South American coast.
